ai.summary: A gentle 4.9 km stroll through Sutton Park in the UK, suitable for beginners and families. The route follows well-maintained paths with mostly flat terrain and minimal elevation, offering a relaxed day out with parkland scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat to gently rolling trails with well-kept gravel and tarmac sections. Some grassy paths and forest edge segments. Expect occasional crowds near popular picnic areas and playgrounds.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths; watch for cyclists. Keep dogs under control. Check weather beforehand; trails can be muddy after rain. Bring water, a small map or charged phone, and inform someone of your plan if hiking alone or in a small group. Shorter daylight hours in winter; wear visible clothing in low light.
recommended_gear: Light weather-appropriate clothing (layers, waterproof jacket if rain is expected)
Small backpack with a map or offline navigation, phone, and a basic first-aid kit
Sunscreen, hat and sunglasses on sunny days
Snacks for a short day out
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with spring and autumn offering the most pleasant conditions; summer is popular but can be busier; winter trails may be muddy and cooler.

seo.title: 5km Walk: Sutton Park – Easy Trail in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore a gentle 4.9 km route in Sutton Park, UK. An easy, family-friendly walk with flat paths and parkland scenery—perfect for beginners.
seo.h1: 5km Walk in Sutton Park (UK) – Easy Trail
